text:
Tried the meatball soup and braised pork rice combo. Rice was decent, though not spectacular. Soup, on the other hand, was memorable. Very tasty, which also meant the radish was infused with flavour. Meatballs were substantial, had a good bite and incorporated mushrooms for additional flavour and texture.

Menu is rather extensive - would return to try their other dishes

Never try never know.
Lovely quaint neighbourhood corner stall serving up home cooked style rice and noodles.
Tried the curry with braised pork rice 👍🏻 and a scallion braised pork noodles.

Had a late lunch so decide to check this place out. 🙏 tried the braised pork 🐖 🥩 noodle 🍜. must say it pretty yummy 😋 also managed to try it pork cutlet noodles 🍜. pork cutlet is quite well done and tender. 👍
Fair portion with fresh ingredients. Comfy food after long day of work. Love the radish soup and bento set.

The uncle looks unfriendly and no smile.. but I give a try and order tabao.. when reach home and open up to eat.. Fuyooo.  it has So Much Meat!! The MEAT is more than rice. Oh My GOD.. I order the Signature Mix Combo.. rice absorb  the sauce is damn good. I would not said is taste better then those I eaten in Taiwan but I would said this is really value for money. Next time will Try those noodles and Curry set.. Will sure come back again. 👍🏻👍🏻
